mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa
Interface EntityInitializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
IdolInitializer
public interface EntityInitializer

EntityInitializer defines the parts that an Entity developer must code to initialize an Entity. The typical way to use an EntityInitializer is shown in the code fragment below. 

                EntityInitializer initializer;
                ...
                Entity e = new Entity(initializer.getContactPort(),
                                                      initializer.getMcastAddress(),
                                                      initializer.getMcastBasePort(),
                                                      initializer.getState(),
                                                      initializer.getControlLogic(),
                                                      initializer.getQoSClasses(),
                                                      initializer.getCommandLogics());

                initializer.scheduleInitialFetches(e);
IMPLEMENTATION SUGGESTION: The constructor of a concrete class implementing this interface takes Properties as its only argument. It throws an InitializationException in the event of failure. The constructor parses the Properties to learn the initial values of an Entity's State; type of ControlLogic; initial servers from which to fetch Views; and other things. The constructor throws EntityInitializer.InitializationException when there is some kind of initialization problem.

Nested Class Summary
static class EntityInitializer.InitializationException
          An implementation of EntityInitializer may throw InitializationException.

Method Detail

getControlLogic

public ControlLogic getControlLogic()
Returns the ControlLogic

Returns:
the ControlLogic

getState

public State getState()
Returns the State populated with all fields and their initial values.

Returns:
the state of the Entity

getContactPort

public int getContactPort()
Returns the contact port. The Entity listens at the contact port on all interfaces.

Returns:
the contact port

getMcastAddress

public String getMcastAddress()
Returns the String representation of the multicast address. It can be null. It can be a point-to-point address. The Entity uses multicast to transmit state changes to its clients.

Returns:
the multicast address

getMcastBasePort

public int getMcastBasePort()
The Entity uses a range of ports on its multicast address. Using a range of ports permits the Entity to multicast different qualities of service to its clients. The port numbers begin with the value returned by getMcastBasePort() and increases thereafter with each new Projector.

Returns:
the starting port number.

getCommandLogics

public List getCommandLogics()
Returns the List of CommandLogic.

Returns:
the list of CommandLogic

getQoSClasses

public List getQoSClasses()
Returns the List of Class, with each member representing a piece of the quality of service offered by the Entity.

Returns:
the list of quality of service Class objects

scheduleInitialFetches

public void scheduleInitialFetches(Entity e)
Tells the run-time to fetch Receptors for an Entity.

Parameters:
e - the Entity
